De la curacio dels enfants les quals so natz les locs de la urina no-perforatz.	Regarding the healing of children who are born with their urine ducts unpenetrated.
Alcunas veguadas alcun dels enfantz es eyssi del ventre de la sua mayre e·l cap de la sua mixtio no es perforat (o es trauc streyt o no es en son loc).	Alcunas veguadas algún dels enfantz es eyssi del ventre de la sua mayre e·l cap de la sua mixtio no es perforat (o es trauc streyt o no es en son loc) 
Donc cove coytar am perforacio de lu tantost que es nascut am spatum mot subtil segon aquesta forma:	Therefore, quickly close up the opening of the wound with a very thin thread according to this shape:
E aprop pausa en le trauc un clavil subtil de plom e ligua aquel, e te per tres jorns o per .iiii.tre.	Then insert into the wound a thin leaden peg and bind it, keeping it there for three days or four.
E quant vol urinar sia remaugut e hurine; e aprop retorne aquel.	And when he wants to urinate, let him be urged on, and let him urinate; then return the peg.
E si tu no pauses le plom, ja es possible que la urina la qual va sobre le loc, no leysa aquest claure.	And if you do not place lead there, it is possible that the urine which goes over this place will dissolve the peg.
Mays aquel del qual le trauc es streyt sia medicat am clavil de Plom, ayssi cum havem dit, per trops dias entro que sia amplificat.	Moreover, when treating an extremely narrow wound with a leaden peg, as we have said, do not keep it in for too many days before removing it.
Mays aquels en les quals es le trauc no en son loc, so leditz, la qual causa es quar de aquels, aquel que es nat e·l trau es deves la fi del cap de la vergua per que no pot urinar a las partidas dedintz, entro que eleva la vergua am la sua ma a las partidas desus; e no es a lu generacio, per so quar le sperma no pot pervenir a la mayre segon rectitut, e es malautia mot laga.	Furthermore, those with wounds that are not located on the penis itself should be treated in this manner: if their wound is at the end of the penis head and causes death due to an inability to urinate or expel semen as one would normally do so when aroused by touching oneself, then elevate your penis using your hand while ejaculating; it is a serious disease.
E la manieyra de la operacio en lu es que·l malaute sia envessat sobre le sieu dos, e aprop exten le cap de la vergua de lu am la tua ma sinistra am vehement extraccio, e inscideys le cap del cap de la vergua del loc del perpucii am spatum agut, ayssi cum es inscizio de pluma, o que tu ne razas alcuna partida, per so que·l mieg de lu vengua semblant al cap de la vergua e que le trauc caia en le mieg loc segon que cove.	The way to operate on the patient is as follows: have him lie down on his back and then extend the head of his penis with your left hand, pulling it out forcefully; cut into the head of the penis at its junction with the foreskin using a sharp blade in a manner similar to that used to split open a feather quill. Do not cause any harm and ensure that the middle part of the glans (the bulbous end) is exposed so that the wound falls within this area.
E guarda te que en la tua operacio de flux de sanc, quar motas vetz accideys aquo; e pausa te a lu am aquo que abscindeys le sanc, e cura la plagua entro que si’ sanada.	And make sure that during your operation for the flow of blood, as it often happens; stop and give him something to cut off the blood, and treat the wound before it is healed.

De albater le qual accideys en le prepucii en le cap de la vergua e de corropcio e negror e adherencia del prepucii del cap de la vergua.	Regarding the whitening that occurs on the foreskin of the penis' head, as well as its corruption, blackening, and adherence to the penile head.
Motas veguadas accideys aquest albater en la vergua e es eminencia de carn laga.	This whitening of the penis often happens due to an excess of moist flesh.
E de aquela una es maligna e autra es no-maligna.	One type is malignant, while another is non-malignant.
No-maligna, cove que suspendas am unci subtil e abscindas aquela entro que aquela mondes tota; e aprop pausa sobre aquela coto submirgit en enguent egipciac; e aprop aquel, cura le am enguent diafinicon entro que sia sanat.	For the non-malignant type, take a sharp lancet and cut it away completely; then apply Egyptian ointment to the wound; finally, treat it with fine ointment until it is healed.
E si albater es maligna, de lega color, lahoras cove que tu aministres cauteri aprop la inscizio de lu e la razio de lu.	If the whitening is malignant, appearing in dark colors, you must apply a cautery after its incision and removal.
Mays si albater es en le prepuci del cap de la vergua no-circumcis, e la una partida de albater es dedintz le prepucii e l’autra partida es defora, lahoras cove que tu ostes albater le qual es dedintz al comensament entro que es consolidat; e lahora tu cura aquel deforo, quar quan tu curas aquel ensemps le prepuci, no es asegurat que no sia trinquat. E aprop cura aquel am l’autra curacio entro que sia sana.	Then attend to the other cure until they are healed.
Mays si endeve flux de sanc, lahoras aministra cauteri lunar segon aquesta forma:	If there is indeed an outflow of blood, then apply the lunar cautery in this manner:
quar cauteri juvatiu es a dos disposicios ensemps, so es a flux de sanc e a la plagua quan es corrumpuda.	As the healing cautery has two applications, it is useful for blood outflow and in cases of corrupted wounds.
E si le cap de la vergua es corrodut e es destruit tot en la hora, lahoras cove que tu intrometas en lo meat del prepucii una canula de plom per so que le malaute urina per aquela.	And if the head of the penis is corroded and destroyed immediately, you should insert a lead cannula into the foreskin so that the patient can urinate through it.
En la adherencia del prepucii am le cap de la vergua (et aquesta adherencia no accideys sino en aquel del qual le prepucii es sa, e sobre lu no es exhigida circumcizio; e quan accideys adherencia per plagua o per apostema) cove que excorjas am spatum obtus entro que sia dissolvut le liament e sia deliurat le cap de la vergua de tota partida.	In the case of adherence between the foreskin and the head of the penis (and this occurs only in those who have not been circumcised, as it is not required; but when adhesion happens due to wound or abscess), you must excise with a blunt spatula until the bond is dissolved and the head of the penis is freed from all attachments.
E si es dificil desirnir aquelas exquisidament, lahoras cove que tu excorjes am spatum alcuna causa del cap de la vergua e del prepucii, e aysso es quar le prepucii, quan es subtil, fort leu es perforat per la sua subtilitat leugierament.	If it is difficult to separate these exceptionally well, then you must excise with a spatula some part of the head of the penis and foreskin, and this is because when the foreskin is thin, it can be lightly perforated by its own thinness.
E aprop separa entre·l prepucii e·l cap de la vergua am dra7 de li subtil, le qual ja es mulhat en l’aygua frega per que no adherescan autra veguada.	And then separate the foreskin from the head of the penis using very fine thread, which has already been soaked in cold water so that it does not stick again.
E aprop sia curat am vi stiptic entro que sia consolidat.	Then clean the wound with astringent vinegar until it is consolidated (healed).
Capitol .lvii.	Chapter 7.
De mundificacio dels enfants e de la curacio de aquo que accideys ad aquels de circumcisio.	On the cleanliness of children and healing those who suffer complications after circumcision.
Circumcisio no es solucio de continuitat ayssi cum las autras plaguas: mays empero cum sia de la nostra operacio e de nostra voluntat, e lus de aquela sia propriament en les enfants, es necessari que asignem en aquela milhor operacio e via pus leugiera perdusent a salut.	Circumcision is not the only cure for continuity like other diseases; rather, as it is our operation and our will, and theirs (the children's) in particular, we must assign to them the best procedure and lightest process that leads to health.
Donc dic que les antics no diyssero circumcisio en alcu dels lors libres, quar no n’usan en las suas leys, e no es sino quar havem aquisit per speriment, la qual causa es que yeu he atrobat la major partida dels artifexs e dels barbies usar circumcisir e mundificacio am novacula e am torores; e usan de liament am fiel e de inscizio am la ungla.	So I say that the ancients did not mention circumcision in any of their books, as it was not part of their laws, and we have only acquired this practice through experimentation. The reason for this is that I have found most surgeons and barbers use a knife and a lancet to perform circumcisions and cleaning, and they use thread made from sinew for stitching.
E yeu ja he prohadas totas aquestas manieras e no atrobegui milhor mondificacio am forfexs, am liament am fiel que en mondificacio cum la ungla, quar motas vetz efugeys la codena pus desus, quar la codena del prepucii a dos tunicas, e roman la tonica pus dejos, e fort leu es forsat ad autra inscizio e dolor sicura.	And I have tried all these methods and found that the best cleaning is done with scissors and thread made from sinew rather than with a lancet, because often you remove too much of the glans, as the glans has two tunics, and the inner one remains, which must then be cut again, causing certain injury and pain.
E am mundificacio le qual es fayta per alphecati, e es digital, del qual usan les sabatiers, no es segurada la inscizio de la extremitat del membre viril, quar fort leu intra en le trau de lu.	Here is the translation of your provided text: 
Mays en la operacio am ungla, fort leu obazeys ferr e corromp la tua operacio.	Mays en la operacio am ungla, fort leu obazeys ferr e corromp la tua operacio. 
E la codena del enfant es breu per natura, e motas veguadas nays en tal manieyra que no ha necessitat de mondificacio, e yeu he vist aquel.	And the child's skin is soft by nature, and many times it happens in such a way that there is no need for modification, and I have seen this myself.
Mays de la mondificacio que·s fa am forfexs e liamentz am fiel, la bontat, experiment descrobic a mi, quar las forfexs so de proporcional inscizio, per aquo quar la acuitat que es desus es ayssi cum la acuitat que es dejos; e donc cum tu premes la tua ma so proporcionadas dos acuitatz, e inscideysso segon una comperacio en un temps; e es fayta compressio del fiel am figura contenent la codena de la vergua de tota partida, am le qual no catz error de tot.	The modification that is done with scissors and a thread of sinew has shown me its goodness, for the scissors are of proportional cutting, because the sharpness above is just like the sharpness below; and so when you press your hand down there are two equal sharpened edges, and it cuts according to this comparison in one motion; and compression of the sinew is made with a contoured figure enclosing the entire shaft of the penis, which catches no mistake at all.
E la manieyra de la operacio primeyra es que tu fassas estar le enfant majorment si es de aquels que entendo un petit, que no fassas sino que tu lies le fiel en la sua vergua tant solament, e que leysses aquel entro al autra dia.	The way the first operation is performed is that for children who are old enough to understand a little bit, you should only tie the thread of sinew around their penis and leave it there until the next day.
E aprop fay aquel alegrar en tota aquela manieyra que es a tu possibla de aquo que recep la sua intelligencia.	Then make them happy in every way you can, according to their level of understanding.
E aprop fa aquel estar entre las tuas mas estatuir preparadament, e no sia ges cezent; e occulta las forfexs en la tua ma o dejos le tieu pe, que l’enfant no veia aquelas ni degun autre dels instruments.	And then have them stand between your arms, prepared and still; hide the scissors in your hand or under your armpit so that the child does not see them or any of the other instruments.
E aprop entremet la tua ma a la vergua de lu e suffla en la codena, e tira aquela entro que sia eyssit le cap de la vergua, e aprop mondifica aquel de aquo que es agregat en ela de sordicia.	Here is the translated text: 
E aprop lia le loc signat am fiel dobla, e aprop ligua pus bas de aquel un petit le segon liament, e aprop te am le dit pous e endic tieu le loc del liament dejos am bona retencio, e inscideys entre dos liaments.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
E aprop eleva la codena sus leugierament e estratz le cap de la vergua; e aprop leyssa le sanc corre petit e petit, quar es milhor ; e pausa polvera desus e sobre la polvera pausa drap en le qual es spandut mugol de huou coyt en ayguaros concosit am oli rozat recent bo; e layssa aquel sobre aquel entro al autra dia; e cura aquel am curacio entro que sia sanat.	Here is the translation of the provided text: 
La forma de las forfexs a mondificacio, aquesta es la forma:	The shape of the forceps is modified, this is how it looks:
Sian las unas extramitatz no-talhantz e las autras sian talhant, que non sia yssit le ram del clau, e sia la longitut de las doas acuitatz ayssi cum la longitut de dos manubres engualment.	One end is not cut and the other is cutting; it should have a single handle that has two prongs whose length equals the combined length of both handles.
Mays la error en mundificacio es quar fort leu efugeys la codena intrinseca tota, o partida de lu deves la inscizio.	However, be careful not to make a mistake in the modification, as any error may cause you to lose the entire intrinsic chain or part of it during the incision.
Donc cove que tu extendas aquela de la tua hora am la tua ungla denant la apostemacio del loc e que inscidas aquela segon equalitat.	Therefore, make sure you extend that part of the forceps at this hour with your nail in front of the affected area and proceed to make an incision according to equality.
E si no la podes tenir am la tua ungla, lahoras extratz aquela am unci e inscideys aquela.	And if you cannot hold it with your nail, then remove that part of the forceps with pincers and make an incision.
Mays si son passatz tres dias, e roman aquo que es imflat dejos la vergua apostemat, lahoras tu leyssa aquo entro que sia cedat le apostema caut, e excorja aquel am fecilitat, e inscidex aquel segon que a tu es preparat.	But if three days have passed and there remains something that is still swollen under the penis after the abscess has subsided, then you should carefully remove it as soon as the abscess has softened; excise that part with ease, and proceed to make an incision according to your preparation.
E guarda te del cap de la vergua, quar no nosera a lu aquo.	And be careful not to touch the head of the penis with that, as it should not come into contact with it.
E donc cura aquel am aquo que la plagua consolida de las polveras las quals havem recomtadas en le tractat de las polveras.	And so treat him with this ointment that solidifies from powders which we have recommended in the treatise of powders.
E si es inscidit de la codena sobre mesura, e obezeys a las partidas desus, aquo no notz a lu.	And if you make an incision over the area according to measurement and follow the directions carefully, it will not harm them.
E mays cura aquel am aquo que havem dit entro que sia sanat.	And continue treating him with what we have advised before he is healed.
Capitol .lviii.	This indicates that this information is part of chapter 58, which may provide additional context for the medical treatise you are translating. Would you like me to translate another portion of the text?
De curacio de urina retenguda en la vesiqua.	The chapter title, "On the treatment of retained urine in the bladder," suggests that this section likely contains instructions on how to treat issues related to urinary retention or bladder problems. Would you like me to translate any specific sentences from this chapter?
Retencio de urina en la vesica es fayta per oppulacio fayta per peyra o per sanc congilat, o per poyre o per carnada, e semblantz ad aquels de aquo que havem dit de las manieyras de curacio en la divisio.	Urine retention in the bladder occurs due to blockages caused by stones or blood clots, infections, or tumors, and the treatment methods are similar to those we mentioned for other conditions in this treatise." 
E si no es dissolvuda la urina, e veses retencio de lu esser per peyra le qual ja es en le col de la vesica, lahoras cove que le malaute sia encorbat sobre les sieus denolhs.	And if the urine is not dissolving properly and there is retention due to a stone that has already formed in the bladder's neck, then it is necessary for the patient to be bent over their knees.
E aprop conponeys les pes de aquel sobre le sieu dos e extendas le sieu ventre de la partida pus desus del sieu dos, e le malaute estrengua le sieu ale tant quant es a lu possible.	Then place the patient's feet on their back and stretch out their belly from where it starts above their spine; have them strain as much as they can.
Donc lahoras le col de la vesica es costreyt ha espulsio de la peyra a las partidas detras, per que la urina es absolta.	So now the neck of the bladder is constricted for the expulsion of the stone at its back; this allows the urine to be released.
E si no es dissolvuda am aquo que havem dit he vehement es fayta la causa sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que aministres extraccio de lu am instrument le qual es apelat siringua, del qual aquesta es la forma: Sia de argent e sia subtil leon conquau, ayssi cum canula de pena de ausel am subtilitat de ray lonc en similitut d’un palm e mig, al qual sia cana subtil en le cap de lu.	And if the problem is not solved with what we have described and it is a severe case for the patient, then you must administer extraction using an instrument called a syringe, which has this form: It should be made of fine silver with a concave lion's head; there should also be a tube made from a bird's feather with the fineness of a ray's spine that is about one and a half palms long, and at its end, it should have a small opening.
E la manieyra del eyssiment de la urina per aquel es que prenguas le fiel doblat e lies en la extramitat de lu lana o coto per bona liadura; e entrometas las extramitatz del fiel en la partida dejos de la ciringua, e inscideys am las forfexs si superflueys alcuna causa de la lana, mays intromet la en la canula am vehemencia E aprop enongeys la ciringua am boder e am album de huou.	The method of inserting the syringe to extract urine is as follows: Take a doubled string and tie it at its end to cotton or wool for a good fit; insert the ends of the string into that which is below the syringe, and cut with scissors any superfluous parts of the cotton. Then push it in vehemently so that it enters the tube; next, extend the syringe with wood and egg white.
E fay cezer le malaute sobre la selha, e embroca la vesiqua de lu e la vergua am olis umitz, e oli de oliva e ayguaros.	Sure! Here is a line-by-line translation of the first source sentence: 
E aprop entromet la ciringua am facilitat entro que pervengua a la razit de la vergua; e aprop dobla la vergua desus a la partida del embelic; e aprop empelleys la ciringua dintz aquela; e aprop empelleys aquela entro que pervengua a la vesica, e aquela centa le malaute esser pervenguda a la causa vuoda, e no es fayt asso segon aquest orde, sino le meat en le qual va a tortuositat.	Here is my translation of the provided text:
E aprop exten le fiel am la lana petit a petit, quar la urina siec la lana.	And then extend the gallbladder gently little by little because urine is like wool.
Aprop extratz aquela e fay per curacio urina, e usa ciringua, no cesses fer aquo e usa ciringua entro que sia evacuada la vesica e le malaute atrobe alleviacio.	Then extract it and make a remedy with urine, using gauze; do not stop doing this and use the gauze until the bladder is evacuated and the patient experiences relief again.
Capitol .lix.	Chapter 59.
De qualitat de clisterizacio de la vezica am clampcedra e am semblantz instrumentz les quals sian acordants ad aquo.	On the quality of bladder irrigation with belladonna and similar instruments that are suitable for this purpose.
Quan accideys en la vesica ulceracio o apostema, o sanc congilat en aquela, o es coartat poyredura, e vols en aquela destillar ayguas e medicinas, lahoras sia fayt am instrument le qual es apelat clampcedra, e aquesta es la forma de lu:	When there is an ulcer or abscess in the bladder, or when blood has clotted within it, or when pus needs to be drained, and you wish to introduce water and medicines into the bladder, then do so with an instrument called a clampcedra. Here's how this tool looks like:
sino que en la extramitat de lu es sorda, so es clausa.	However, its end is closed, not perforated.
Et en aquela so tres traucs: dos de la una partida , ayssi quo vezes.	And in it, there are three holes: two on one side, the same number of times.
En le comensament es loc concau, en le qual es aquo que es enpellit, e sia segon quantitat que oppile aquel, ses addicio, entro que quan alcuna causa es ab aquel tirada de las humiditatz, sia atirada, e quan es expellida, am aquo sia atirada, e quan es expellit lonc, segon que fa clampcedra am la qual es phicat naphta en las batalhas de mar.	Its beginning is concave; this is where the liquid that will be pushed in is placed. It should be added according to how much you want to fill it with, until when something from within is pulled out due to any cause and is then poured by being withdrawn, as what happens when naphtha is thrown onto a ship during battle.
Donc cum tu vols prohicir humiditatz en la vesica, entromet la extremitat de clapcedra en la humiditat, e atira am aquel aquo que es empellit a las partidas desus, quar la humiditat es atirada en la conquavitat de clapcedra.	When you want to remove moisture from the bladder, insert the end of the reed into the moisture and draw it up with water that is forced towards higher regions, for moisture is drawn into the cavity of the reed.
E aprop entromet la extramitat de clapcedra en la vergua segon que havem recomtat en la ciringua; e aprop empelleys la humiditat am aquo que empelleys, quar aquela humiditat perve a la vesica tantost, e le malaute cent aquela.	Then insert the end of the reed into the penis as we have previously described in the surgical procedure; and now drive out the moisture with water that you push through it, for this moisture passes immediately to the bladder, which the patient feels.
Forma del cristeri subtil am le qual la vesica es cristerizada, e es aquela la forma:	The shape of the catheter that is used to empty the bladder takes this form:
E sia fayta de argent o de lato, de la qual le cap pus aut sia semblant a petita pluma, e dejos lu cana dedintz liament.	It is made of silver or brass, its head being as large as a small feather, and there are fine channels inside it.
E aprop pren vesica de moto, e pausa en aquela la humiditat que vols cristirizar en la vesica, e aprop lia aquela entre dos am fort liguatura am fiel doble, e escalfa aquela humiditat sobre le foc.	Then take a bladder of an animal and place in it the moisture that you wish to introduce into the bladder; then tie this tightly with strong double thread, and heat the moisture over fire.
E aprop entromet la extremitat del cristeri en la vergua.	Then insert the end of the catheter into the penis.
E aprop estrenh la tua ma sobre la vesica am la humiditat am strectura descent entro que·l malaute centa que aquela humiditat ja es pervenguda a la vesica.	Then grasp your hand over the bladder, with the moistened part tightly closed until the patient feels that this moisture has reached his bladder.
Mays si a tu no es present vesica, lahoras tu pren una pessa de parguames e fay de aquel cercle; e perfora aquel de tota la sua retonditat; e aprop entromet fiel fort en aquels traucs, ayssi quo so revolgut; e aprop agregua le cercle ayssi quo es agreguat alsofatur, pus que tu pausas en aquel aquo que tu vols de las humiditatz, e olis e ayguas.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E aprop tu lia aquel en le instrument e fay am aquel ayssi cum has fayt am la vesica, e exprescio am la tua ma entro que la humiditat pervengua a la vesica.	And then you tie him onto the instrument and do so as you have done with the bladder, expressing by hand to prevent moisture from reaching the bladder.
Capitol .lx.	Chapter 60.
De extraccio de peyra.	On the extraction of stones (or potentially, gallstones).
Nos ja havem dit en la divisio las specias de peyra e curacio de lu am medicinas, e la diferencia entre peyra engendrada en los ronhos e peyra engendrada en la vesica, e les senhals de aquela.	We have already spoken about the different types of stones and their treatment with medicines in the previous division, as well as the difference between stones formed in the liver and those formed in the bladder, along with their distinguishing characteristics.
E havem dit la peyra en la qual catz operacio am ma, e seccio.	And we have discussed the type of stone that requires surgical intervention with hands and cutting.
E la peyra engendrada en la vesica propriament es aquela que es ficada en la vesica.	The stone formed specifically in the bladder is the one that becomes lodged within it.
E yeu so narrant aquel am exposicio manifesta e abreviacio.	And I describe this with clear exposition and brevity.
Donc dic que peyra engendrada en la vesica majorment ve als enfantz; e dels senhals de lu es que la urina que es eyssida de la vesica es semblant a aygua en la sua subtilitat, e apar en aquela arena; e le malaute fregua la sua vergua, e motas veguadas pen, e aprop es dressada; e am aquo yeys foro le cul en motz de aquels.	Thus, I say that stones formed in the bladder mostly occur in children; and their signs are as follows: the urine excreted from the bladder is similar to water in its subtlety and has sand-like particles; the patient scratches their genitals frequently, often cries out in pain, and assumes an arched posture; for this reason, many have had their bottoms pierced by these stones.
E es laugiera la sanacio dels enfants de aquela entro que han conseguitz xiiii ans; e es dificil curacio en les viels.	And it is easier for children under 14 years old to recover, while curing the elderly people is hard.
Mays en les joves es migiera per aquo quar es entre aquels.	It could be helpful for young adults as they are in between children and the elderly.
E de aquel del qual la peyra es major e la curacio es pus leugiera; E si es pauca, es contraria ad aquela.	And for those with large kidney stones, the recovery is easier; if they are small in size, it's the opposite.
Donc cum pervenem a la curacio de aquela, cove al comensament de aquela que mondifiquem le malaute am cristeri le qual extragua tota la fenda la qual es en les sieus budels; quar aquela fenda alcunas veguadas prohibeys la envencio de la peyra deves la inquisicio de lu.	Thus, when we reach the treatment of this condition, it is necessary at the beginning to modify the patient's diet by making them drink crystal clear water that eliminates all waste from their intestines; because sometimes this waste can prevent the kidney stone from coming out.
E aprop sia pres le malaute am les sieus pes e sia contosit e maugut enjos per so que la peyra descenda al preon de la vesica, o que saute de loc aut alcunas veguadas.	Then the patient should be held by their feet and rotated while being shaken a bit for the stone to go down into the bladder or jump out sometimes.
E aprop fay aquel cezer entre las tuas mas preparat, e las mas de lu sian dejos las coysas de lu, per so que la vesica tota sia fayta declinant a las partidas dejos.	Then prepare the patient's hands and place them under their buttocks so that when the bladder is fully emptied it naturally leans toward those parts.
E aprop perquier aquela e tota aquela deforo.	And then do this procedure on him and repeat all of these steps as needed.
Donc si sentes la peyra en l’espazi, lahoras tu te coyta tantost am seccio sobre lu.	Therefore, if you feel the stone in the space, then quickly perform an incision on them.
E si no catz de tot dejos le tieu tocament, lahoras cove que tu untes am oli le tieu dit indic de la ma sinistra, si malaute es enfant, o le dit miga si es jove complit, e entrometas aquel en le sieu cul.	And if it does not catch at all with your touch, then you should anoint with oil your left index finger or middle finger, depending on whether the patient is a child or an adult, and insert it into their rectum.
E perquier de la peyra entro que stia dejos le tieu dit.	On the right side of the stone inside you should feel with your finger.
E converteys aquela petit a petit entro al col de la vesica.	And move it gradually towards the neck of the bladder.
E aprop prem sobre aquel am lo tieu dit, e expelleys aquel a las partidas defora ves le loc del qual vos la seccio.	Then press on it with your finger, and expel it to the exterior, away from the incision site.
E comanda al ministra que prema la vesica am la sua ma; e comanda a un autra ministra que am la sua ma dextra extenda les genetius a las partidas desus, e am la sua autra ma remaugua la codena la qual es dejos les genetius, en partida del loc en le qual se fa la seccio.	Instruct the assistant to press on the bladder with their hand; and instruct another assistant to use their right hand to stretch the testicles outward, and with their other hand hold down the scrotum below the testicles, away from the incision site.
E aprop entromet espatum be inscident del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	Then insert the instrument called 'espatum', which is used for incisions, of this shape:
e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; e sia la seccio sobre aquela peyra e·l tieu dit sia en le cul, e sia fayta seccio transversa, per que la seccio defora sia ampla e dedintz streyta segon la quantitat que egrecio de la peyra sia a lu possibla, e no major, quar fort leu comprem le tieu dit le qual es en le cul la peyra deves la seccio, e es foro-getada ses defacultat.	e scindeys en lu aquo que es entre·l cul e·ls genetius, no en le mieg loc, abantz al latz de la coyssa sinistra; 
E sapias que de la peyra es alcuna a la qual so angle e margers, per que le eyssiment de lu es fayt deficil per aquo.	And know that with regards to stones (in the body), there are some which have angles and edges, making their expulsion difficult.
E de aquela aquo es leon semblant a glan, e es redonda, e es fayt de lu leugier eyssiment.	And this is like a lion that resembles an acorn, it is round, and its expulsion is made easier.
Donc si es aquela al qual so angles e marger, ajusta en la fissura.	Therefore if this stone has edges and margins, adjust it to fit into the fissure.
E si no es ayssi foro-getada, lahoras cove que tu engenes sobre aquel, o que strenguas sobre aquel am gesti decentment, la extremitat del qual sia ayssi cum lima am le qual strenguas sobre la peyra, e no evasesca de lu; o que entrometas dejos lu instrument subtil de curvada extremitat.	And if it is not removed in this way, you must insert your fingers into the orifice, or grab it with a decent gesture using your hand's extremity, which should be like a lime that scrapes the stone and does not evade it; alternatively, use a delicate instrument with a curved end to introduce under the stone.
Mays si tu no podes sobre aquel, lahoras tu amplifica le trauc un petit, e si tu veus flux de sanc, abscindeys en strenh aquel am vitriol trissat.	But if you cannot extract it, slightly enlarge the opening and, should you see blood flowing from it, tie off that area with a strand of ground vitriol.
Mays si la peyra es mays de una, lahoras al comensament tu impelleys la ma a la boca de la vesica, e aprop inscideys sobre lu; e aprop impelleys un petit aprop aquo; e semblantment fay si son motas mays de doas.	But if there are multiple stones present, first insert your hand into the bladder's opening and probe it; then push a little more inside; act similarly if there are more than two stones.
E si es peyra mot gran, lahoras ignorancia es que tu inscidas aquel am gran seccio, quar accideys al malaute una de doas causas: o que mora o que endevengua a lu destillacio de urina continuabla, per aquo quar le loc no es de tot consolidat.	If the stone is very large, it is ignorant to make a large incision because it will cause the patient one of two problems: either death or an ongoing urine distillation, due to the area not being fully consolidated.
Mays aministra expulcio de lu entro que sia fora-getada, o engenia en la fractura de lu am las forfexs entro que extragua aquela en pessas.	Either administer an expulsion of the object that is forgotten or engineer a fracture with scissors to extract it in pieces.
Donc cum tu auras cumplit la tua opperacio, lahoras omple la plagua de enses de aloe e de sanc de drago, e strenh aquel.	After you have completed the operation, fill the wound with aloe juice and dragon's blood, then stitch it up.
E pausa sobre aquel drap enfus en oli e vi, o en oli rozat e aygua frega, per so que apostema caut sia cedat.	Place on it a cloth soaked in oil and wine, or in rose oil and hot water, to make sure that the abscess does not break.
E aprop resupina le malaute sobre le sieu col, e no deslias le liament entro al tertz dia.	Then turn the patient onto their stomach over a pillow, and do not remove the bandages until the third day.
E cum aquel auras desliat, embroca le loc am aygua e mot oli, e aprop cura aquel am enguent diafinicon e am enguent diabazilicon entro que sia sanat.	And when you have unbound them, flush the area with water and plenty of oil, then cure it with ointment of alkanet and ointment of red lead until they are healed.
Mays si en la plagua accideys apostema caut, adhust e corrosiu, e de aquel semblantz ayssi cum si le sanc es en la vesica congelat, e per lu es la hurina prohibida (e aquo es conogut per la egressio del sanc am urina), a donc entromet lo tieu dit en la plagua e extratz aquel sanc, quar si roman provoca la vesica a corropcio de la vesica e de lu putrefaccio.	However, if there is an abscess which appears burnt and corrosive in the wound, and it resembles blood being trapped inside a bladder, and therefore urine is prohibited (as this is known from the exit of blood with urine), then insert your finger into the wound to extract that blood, as if left, it would cause inflammation in the bladder and its putrefaction.
E aprop lava la plagua am vi agre, aygua e sal, e am opposicio a tota specia, am aquo que conveneys a lu de la curacio entro que sia sanat.	Then wash the wound with vinegar, water, and salt, applying any relevant remedy until he is healed.
E cove en las horas de tota la curacio que tu lies amdos las coyssas e ajustes las medicinas las quals so pausadas sobre le loc.	Cover the entire treatment area by bringing both thighs together and securing the medicines that have been placed on it.
E si la peyra es petita e es en le meat de la vergua, e es ficat en lu, e eyssement de urina es prohibit, lahoras cura aquel am aquo que yeu recomti denant que pervenguas a seccio, quar tropas veguadas per aquesta curacio yest acusat de seccio; e ja yeu e esproat aquo, e es que tu prenguas un perforador de ferr alfelut, del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if the stone is small and situated in the middle of the penis, having already entered it, and micturition is prohibited, then treat it with what I have recommended before, lest you be accused of performing surgery; now I will explain this, and take a red-hot iron instrument shaped like this:
de triangulada extramitat, agut, ficat en fust.	With a triangular tip, sharp, enclosed in wood.
E aprop pren fiel, e lia am aquel la vergua dejos la peyra per so que no retorne a la vesica.	Then take flax thread, and bind it around the penis below the stone to prevent its return to the bladder.
E aprop entromet le ferr en la vergua, perforant am fecilitat entro que·l perforador vengua ad aquela peyra.	Then insert the iron instrument into the penis, piercing with ease until the tip reaches the stone.
E revolveys le perforador am la tua ma en aquela peyra petit a petit, e tu perforsa la perforacio de lu entro que fassas aquel del autra part penetrar; quar la urina tantost es absolta.	Rotate the instrument with your hand on the stone gradually, piercing to make way for the other end of it to emerge through its hole; then micturition will immediately take place.
E aprop prem la tua ma sobre aquo que es romas de la peyra de la partida deforo de la vergua, quar aquela es trinquada, e es foro-getada am la urina, e le malaute es sanat.	Then press your hand over what is broken of the stone from the outside of the penis, for it is cracked and blocked by urine, and the patient is healed.
Mays si aquesta curacio no es a tu aparelhada per alcuna causa la qual prohibeys de aquela, lahoras lia un fiel dejos la peyra, e autra fiel desus la peyra.	But if this treatment is not equipped to you for any reason that prohibits it, then tie one string beneath the stone and another string above the stone.
E aprop encideys sobre la peyra en aquela vergua entre doas liaduras.	Then make an incision on the penis between the two ligatures, over the stone.
E aprop extratz aquela.	Then extract it.
E aprop deslia le liament e mondifica le sanc congilat, le qual es fayt en la plagua.	Then untie the ligature and modify the congealed blood, which is done on a plate.

De la curacio de hernia que es de vitz.	On the treatment of an inguinal hernia.
Vit es apostema envolut per alcuna envolucio semblant a broto am mollificacio dels testiculs, e es fayt dificil movement exercitiu e deambulacio sobre le malaute.	Inguinal hernia is an abscess wrapped by some enveloping structure similar to swelling of the scrotum, and it makes physical exertion and walking difficult for the patient.
E en la curacio de aquesta malautia es per temor per aquo del qual es precedida rememoracio.	And in the treatment of this illness, it is important to consider the patient's fear and anxiety, which often precedes the onset of symptoms.
Empero cove que diguam opperacio en aquela segon que fero les primiers.	However, let us call this procedure an operation, as it was the first of its kind.

E aprop excorja de tota partida ayssi quo a tu havem dit en extraccio de arceria las quals so en las templas.	And carefully remove any parts that may have been mentioned earlier, such as the arch of the temple bones during extraction.

E aprop cura la plagua am curacio de las autras plaguas en las quals vols sania esser engendrada per so que caian les vaysels les quals noyreysso un de dos genetius, quar no es mal per aquo.	And then treat the wound with a cure for other wounds where you want healing to be generated by causing veins to burst, as this is not harmful.
Mays si accideys vit a totz les bayssels, lahoras cove que·ls testicols sian extragutz o que les testicols per aquo se cequo am les vayssels, per que sia privat de tot nutriment per la inscizio dels vayssels, e que sian estaborits, o que cequo per so que no sia juvament am aquels.	But if there is an accident where all the vessels are affected, then it is necessary to remove the testicles or ensure that they become detached from the vessels, preventing them from receiving any nourishment through vessel incision, and leaving them useless, or ensuring their withering so they do not receive benefit.

De la cura de hernia entestinal.	On the treatment of intestinal hernia." 
Le adveniment de aquesta hernia es per seccio que endeve en le ciphac extendut sobre le ventre de part dels angunars del mirac del ventre, per que deysendo les budels de aquela ruptura ad alcu dels budels.	The occurrence of this hernia is due to an incision that begins in the upper abdomen and extends over the belly from the region of the diaphragm, so that when the intestines fall through that rupture, they descend into one of the intestines.
E aquesta ruptura es o del ciphac o de excencio de lu, e accideysso aquestas doas specias per motas causas: o percussio, o per sautz, o per clamor, o per elevacio de alcuna causa greu, o per semblantz.	This rupture can be either from the diaphragm or due to an excision of it, and these two types occur for various reasons: due to a blow, a fall, a loud noise, or a sudden elevation caused by some severe condition, or similar events.
E·l senhal de aquo, quan es per extencio del ciphac, es que accideys pauc a pauc en lonc temps, e no accideys soptament, e es apostema engual entro ves le preon per so quar le ciphac comprem le budel.	The sign of this condition, when it is caused by an extension of the diaphragm, is that it happens gradually over a long period and does not occur suddenly. It is characterized by an abscess forming within the chest due to the diaphragm pressing on the intestine.
E le senhal de lu es quan es per seccio del ciphac, quar al comensament fa accidir dolor vehement sobtament; e es apostema divers aparent dejos la codena propdana aparent, e aquo es per eyssiment del budel, e·l cos de lu a las partidas deforo del ciphac.	The sign of this condition when it is caused by an incision in the diaphragm is that initially, it causes severe pain suddenly; there is also an abscess different from the one mentioned earlier appearing below the wound, which is due to the intestine protruding through the diaphragm's opening, and the body reacting at its outer edges beyond the diaphragm.
E alcunas veguadas es fora-getat am le budel la tela, e es apelada aquesta hernia entestinal zirbal.	In some cases, the intestine is pushed through an opening in the abdominal wall, and this type of hernia is called an intestinal inguinal hernia.
E alcunas veguadas es fayta am ventositat, e alcunas veguadas corr en le budel fenda, e aqui es retenguda, e es am aquo gran pernitia3 del malaute, e alcunas veguadas fa endevenir dolor malvada e majorment quan es premut.	Here is my translation of the provided text: 
E en la curacio de las especias de aquesta malautia am ferr es temor, per que cove que sia esquivat le cazament en aquela.	And in curing the various aspects of this illness, fear is involved, so it's necessary to avoid causing harm during treatment.
E la manieyra de la operacio de aquela es que comandes al malaute que redugua le budel am la sua ma a las partidas dedintz de la sua conquavitat si obezeys al sieu retornament, e aprop sia envessat sobre le sieu col entre las tuas mas, e eleva las cambas de lu.	The way to perform the operation is as follows: instruct the patient to gently guide their intestine back into its cavity using their hands, following its natural curve if it does not obey and returns outward, then invert it over their neck between your two hands, lifting their legs.
E aprop sten la codena la qual siec la codena dels testicols a las partidas desus, e inscideys la codena dels testicols tota per le lonc; e aprop fiqua en doas labias de la seccio uncis segon que indigeysses a hubrir la seccio am aquels.	Then grasp the cord that is attached to the testicles on top, make an incision along the entire length of the cord of the testicles; and place two curved clamps onto the edges of the cut as needed in order to open the wound with them.
E si’ la seccio segon la quantitat que a tu sia possible que de aquela le huou sia foro-getat.	And if the cut is such that you cannot fully open it.
E aprop excorja aquela ciphaqueth les quals so dejos la codena dels testicols, entro que sia descubert le ciphac blanc dur de quascuna partida.	Then remove the skin that covers the testicles, ensuring you reveal the white hard capsule on each side.
Lahoras tu entromet le tieu dit en aquo que siec le testicol, en aquo que es entre ciphac blanc, le qual es dejos la codena del huou, e entre le ciphac segon, e absolve am aquel’adherencia que es en la partida detras del huou.	Now insert your finger into what follows the testicle, that is between the white capsule, which is below the cord of the testicles, and between the second capsule, then remove any adhesion located behind the testicle.
E aprop mau am la ma la codena dels testicols a las partidas deforo, e am aysso exten le ciphac blanc en sus am la ma sinestra, e eleva le huou am le ciphac a la partida de la seccio; e comanda al ministre que extenda le huou ensus e tu dissolveys la adherencia que es detras am solucio complida.	Sure! Here is the translation: 
E cerqua am les tieus ditz que lay no sia alcuna causa del budel envelopat en le ciphac blanc dur.	And ask them about what could be the cause of the hernia being wrapped in a hard white cloth.
Mays si tu atrobas de lu alcuna causa, lahoras tu enpelleys aquel al ventre dejos.	Once you find any cause of it in him, then remove that from his belly.
E aprop tu pren una agulha en la qual sia fiel gros fayt de x fiels, e entromet aquel deves le derier del ciphac, le qual es jos la codena dels testicols, la qual siec seccio; e aprop inscideys las extremitatz las quals emineysso del fiel entro que sian quatre fiels, e aprop compausa alcus de lor sobre alcuna figura en manieyra de crotz; e lia am aquel le ciphac del qual havem dit que es dejos la codena dels testicols am fort liament de dos partz.	Then take a needle that has a thick wire made of ten wires, and pass it through the back of the cloth which is below the chain of testicles in its section; then cut the ends of four wires protruding from the core so that you have four cores, and tie them together to form some sort of cross; bind this with the aforementioned piece of cloth that was just under the chain of testicles tightly on both sides.
E aprop envolveys las extremitatz dels fiels e lia aquelas am liament vehement entro que alcu dels vayssels que noyrrisso aquels no puscan trametre alcuna causa per so que de aqui no accida apostema caut.	Wrap the ends of the wires and bind them firmly with strong thread, until none of the vessels that nourish those can transmit any cause which may result in an open sore here.
E pausa autra veguada liament segon foro le primier liament, lonh de lu mens tres ditz; e aprop aquestz dos liaments layssa del ciphac le qual es dejos la codena dels testicols la quantitat de la grandeza del dit, e inscideys tot le romanent segon redondeza, e osta de lu le huou.	Place another binding thread around the first binding as you did before, but this time at a distance of less than three fingers from it; leave these two bindings on the cloth which is below the chain of testicles in an amount equal to the length of one finger, and cut off all the rest according to its rounded shape, then remove the hernia from him.
E aprop inscideys en la partida dejos de la codena dels testicols per seccio de la qual corra sanc e sania ayssi cum havem recomtat en aquo que havem dit.	And now, make an incision below the scrotum, dividing it so that blood and pus can drain as we have explained in our previous instructions.
E aprop aministra lana submersa en oli, e pausa en la plagua; e aministra le liament le qual havem recomtat (e alcunas veguadas le ciphac blanc es cauterizat, le qual havem dit aprop la inscizio de lu temen de flux de sanc, quar motas veguadas accideys aquels) e leyssa le liament entro que per si caia.	Then, apply a cloth soaked in oil and place it on the wound; use the bandage we have described (and sometimes cauterize with white cypress, as we mentioned earlier regarding the flow of blood, for there are many cases when this occurs) and leave the bandage until it falls off.
Mays si le cazement de lu es tardat, lahoras de aygua cauda sia embrocat, e pausa sobre aquel entro que caia segon que havem dit.	If the wound is delayed in healing, then warm water should be used for embrocation and applied to it until it falls off, as we have mentioned earlier.
E aprop cura la plagua am l’autra curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanat.	Then treat the wound with another remedy for wounds until it is healed.

De la disropcio que es fayta en les anguonars.	Regarding the procedure performed on the testicles." 
Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.	Alcunas veguadas endeve ruptura en les angonars ayssi cum havem dit, e emineys le loc.
E no deyssen als genetius alcuna causa dels budels al genetius; e si deyssen, aquo es pauc; e retorna s’en en totas horas.	And do not allow any cause of hernias to remain in the genital area; and if there is one, it is minor; but it returns at all hours.
Mays si es prolonguat le temps am aquo, es ajustada fissura en le ciphac entro que deysenda le budel en le ciphac; e accideys aquo per la extencio del ciphac le qual es en le angonars ayssi cum havem dit, la qual causa es quar le ciphac es estendut, e aprop es mollificat e·l loc es apostemat e emineys. E la cura de lu es am cauteri ayssi quo es precedida la narracio de lu.	The cure for this condition is to use the cautery as described earlier in the narrative.
E alcunas veguadas es curada am ferr segon aquesta manieyra: e es que·l malaute jagua sobre le sieu dos entre las tuas mas, e aprop secca le loc de la ruptura dels apostemas emineys am seccio per la latitut segon la quantitat de tres ditz.	In some cases, it can be cured with an iron rod using this method: have the patient lie on their back between two servants' hands and then dry out the rupture site by scraping across its width for a length of three fingers.
E aprop strenh le ciphac blanc que es jos la codena entro que sia descubert.	Then strengthen the white inguinal ligament, which is below the groin area, making sure it is exposed.
E aprop pren le ray e pausa aquel sobre le loc eminent del ciphac, e prem aquel al preon del ventre.	Take the iron rod and place it over the protruding area of the inguinal canal, pressing it towards the front of the abdomen.
E aprop cus le dos locs eminentz sobre la extremitat del ray del ciphac, e ajusta am la sutura un de aquels am l’autre.	And then cover the two protruding places with the tip of your finger, and join one to the other with the suture.
E aprop extratz la extremitat del ray, e no inscidas del ciphac de tot, ni no extenda le huou, ni autra causa ayssi cum yeu te fi saber en la curacio de hernia entestinal.	Then remove the tip of the finger, do not push it too deep into the navel, and do not extend the wound, or any other cause as I have previously instructed you in the treatment of intestinal hernia.
E aprop cura aquela am la curacio de las plaguas, e cum inscideyses les fiels, mundifica aquela e restaura la plagua entro que sia consolidada; quar le ciphac es contrayt e no es ajustada la eminencia de ruptura.	Then treat that with the cure for wounds, and when you incise the veins, clean it and restore the wound before it is fully healed; because the navel has contracted and the bulge of the rupture is not properly aligned.
E cauteri es milhor en aquest loc, quar es pus propda a salut.	Cauterization is better in this place, as it is closer to the source of health.

De mollificacio de la codena dels testiculs.	Regarding softening the cord of the testicles.
Motas veguadas la codena dels testiculs en alcus homes es mollificada per aysso quar las carns que so entre aquela son mollificadas, e es fedat le reguardament de lu.	Note that the cord of the testicles in some men is softened because the tissues between them are also softened; this has been observed.
Adonc necessari es ad aquel que es preguat en la curacio de lu que fassa jazer le malaute segon le sieu dos, e enscida tota la codena la qual es mollificada sobre la codena natural; e aprop que ajuste doas labias am la sutura.	It is necessary for the one who is treating it in order to cure that person to make them lie on their back and incise all of the cord that has softened above the natural cord, then join the two lips with a suture.
E si vols, cus en le comensament la superfluitat de la codena mollificada am tres cozeduras o quatre e am ferma sutura.	And if you wish, begin by softening the surplus of skin with three or four cauterizations and then make a firm suture.
E aprop inscideys entre las suturas; e aprop cura per curacio de las autras plaguas entro que sia sanat e caian les fiels.	Then make an incision between the sutures, and take care of other wounds or injuries, ensuring they are healed and free from infection.

De castracio.	On Castration." 
Sapias que castratio en nostre ley es excomengada, mays per causa es legut a mi que·m remembre de lu en aquest libre; e no es necessaria la rememoracio de lu sino per doas manieyras, de las quals es la una per so que aquo sia en la sciensa del metge quan es enterroguat de aquela, que sapia la curacio de lu al qual accideys; e l’autra manieyra es que nos motas vetz havem necessitat de castracio de autras bestias per les juvamentz nostres per aquelas, ayssi cum de motos, e de bocs, e de porcs, e de semblantz a las bestias.	Here is the translation of the first source sentence:
E donc dic que castracio es fayta en dos manieyras: o per atrissio, o per fissura a seccio.	And so I say that castration is performed in two ways: either by constriction or by incision.
Mays en aquela que es fayta per atrissio, la via de la opera es que nos fassam cezer la bestia en aygua cauda entro que·ls genetius de lu sian mollificatz e sian linhitz e que pendan.	In the case of castration performed by constriction, the method is to submerge the animal in warm water until its genitalia are softened and loosened, allowing for easy manipulation.
E aprop pren aquels am la tua ma entro que sian resols e no apparescan dejos le tocament.	Then take those [genitalia] with your hand while they are relaxed and do not appear to be affected by the touch.
Mays en castracio fayta per fissura e seccio, cove que tu tenguas la bestia e premas la codena dels testicols de lu am la ma senestra.	For castration performed by incision, it is necessary to hold the animal and press on the base of its testicles with your left hand.
E aprop lia le suspensori, e inscideys sobre quascun huou am una seccio entro que dos huous proceseysso.	Then lift up the scrotum and make an incision over each testicle with a single stroke.
E aprop inscideys aquels pus que auras quascu excorjat.	Then, after making the incisions, remove those [testicles] that you have skinned.
E no leysses sobre aquels del ciphac alcuna causa, sino le ciphac subtil le qual es sobre les vazes.	And do not leave any part of the testicles inside the body cavity, only the delicate covering which is over the veins.
E aquesta manieyra de castracio es milhor la qual es fayta per atrissio, quar atrissio fort leu layssa alcuna causa dels testicols per que la bestia desira coyt.	This method of castration by constriction is better, as strong constriction leaves no part of the testicles inside, ensuring that the animal does not suffer from lingering pain.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia sanada.	And then treat the wound until it is healed.

De la cura de hermafrodozia.	On the treatment of hermaphroditism.
Hermafrodozia en les homes es segon dos manieyras: la una es quar o appar en aquo que siec l’espazi en la codena de testiculs, en aquel que es entre dos testiculs figura quar cunh de femna en la qual so pels.	Hermaphroditism in men occurs in two ways: one is when a hole appears in the space where the testicles should be, and there is an indentation like that of a woman's genitals with hair on it.
E alcunas veguadas de aquel corr urina le qual es en la codena dels testiculs.	And sometimes, from that area where the hole is located (in the region of the testicles), urine flows.
Mays en las femnas es una specia: e es que·l conh de la femna sobre le pentenilh es ayssi cum dos testiculs de home un pauc de tot yminiheys a la partida deforo ayssi cum le perpucii de home e dos testicols.	However, in women, it is a different matter: the woman's genitals on their pubic mound are like two testicles of a man but slightly smaller and located further apart like the foreskin of a man with two testicles.
E la curacio es de tres specias: de dos dels homes e de una specia de las femnas.	The treatment is also different, being three ways: for the two types found in men and one type found in women.
E es que cove que tu inscidas aquelas carns ajustadas entro que efuga la emprecio de aquela, e aprop que cures aquelas am curacio de las autras plaguas.	It is necessary to insert those tight tissues/muscles until the price of that operation is paid, and then you can treat those with a cure for other wounds.
E en la segonda specia dels homes de la qual yeys urina la qual es en la codena dels testiculs, no es curacio ni opperacio en lu.	In the second type of men where urine comes out in the region of the testicles, there is neither a cure nor an operation for him.
Capitol .xxi.	Chapter 21.
De lentinge e de carn eminent per causas de las femnas.	Of tumours and flesh that arise due to causes in women.
Lentige fort leu es ajustada sobre causas naturals entro que es etressat e es fayt leg le reguardament; e alcunas veguadas es magnificada en alcunas femnas en tant entro que es spandit ayssi cum en les homes e perve entro al coito.	A mole is generally attributed to natural causes, although it can be accentuated and made noticeable by exposure; in some cases, it becomes prominent in some women to such an extent that it occurs as well in men, especially after intercourse.
Adonc cove que tu tenguas la superfluitat de lentinge am la tua ma o am unci e inscidas.	Therefore, when you have an abundance of moles on your body, take some in your hand or with a needle and press them.
E no ultimes en inscizio, majorment en le preon de la razit, per so que no endevengua flux de sanc.	And do not end the incision in the middle of the mole, especially on its edge or rim, to prevent a flow of blood.
E aprop cura aquela am curacio de las plaguas entro que sia sanada.	Then treat that with wound-healing ointments until it is healed.
Mays carn nascuda es carn que nays en le horrifici de la mayre entro que umple aquel, e fort leu es eyssit a las partidas deforo segon semblansa de coa (e per aquo alscus primiers appelero aquo “malautia caudada”); donc cove que nos inscidam ayssi cum inscidem lentinge, e curem aquela entro que sia sanada.	A tumour of newly formed flesh is a flesh that grows in the womb of the mother because it fills that place; and it can be clearly seen on the outside as similar to a tail (and for this reason, some may call it 'tailed disease'); therefore, we must cut it just like we cut moles, and treat it until it is healed.
Capitol .lxxii.	The number ".lxxii." likely represents the chapter or section number in the medieval medical treatise you provided. In Roman numerals, ".lxxii." is equivalent to the number 72, so it could be Chapter 72 of the treatise.
De curacio de alratica.	De curacio de alratica." 
Alratica es que le conh de la femna no sia perforat, o sia le trauc petit.	Alratica is that the woman's womb should not be perforated or have a small outlet (birth canal).
E es o natural o accidental.	This means whether it is natural or by accident/circumstance. In the context of childbirth, this could refer to the position of the baby during delivery, which can impact the ease of birth.
Accidental es per malautia la qual ha precedit, e aquela es fayta o per carn nada ajustada o per ciphac subtil o espes.	In this context, "accidental" refers to the complications that arise due to a previous illness or health condition of the mother. The text mentions various factors contributing to these complications: an unadjusted body (perhaps referring to inadequate physical preparation), subtle contractions (indicating weak labor pains), or thick secretions/discharge.
E es fayt o en le preon de la mayre, o en les costatz de lu, o en le pus sobira de lu, o en le pus bas de lu, e prohibeys de cuoyt e de enprenguacio e de enfantament, e fort leu prohibeys las mestruas.	Here, the text describes the different areas of a woman's body where these accidental complications can occur: the abdomen (likely referring to uterine issues), her sides, upper back, or lower back. It advises against any external pressure or strain during pregnancy and further cautions against menstruation during this time. These practices were believed to be harmful to both mother and child.
E la cognicio de aquela es fayta per reguardament de la metrona, si la oppilacio es apparent, propdana; mays si no es apparent, lahoras tu cerqua aquela am les tieus ditz o am le ray.	The text here refers to the diagnosis of these accidental complications during pregnancy. If the obstruction or blockage is visible (oppilatio), then immediate action must be taken. However, if it is not visible externally, one should use their hands (tieus) or a rod-like instrument (ray) for internal examination and further assessment. This was likely done to identify any issues with the fetus' position or the mother's health that could hinder an easy birth.
Mays si oppilacio es per ciphac subtil, e es propda a las doas labias, lahoras tu coyta e disromp aquela.	If the obstruction is caused by weak contractions (ciphac) and it appears between the two lips of the birth canal, then one must wait for the appropriate moment to intervene and disrupt/weaken this blockage. This may refer to a procedure aimed at assisting the baby's passage through the birth canal during difficult labor.
E es que pauses sobre las doas labias pulvils, e aprop pausa les tieus ditz indicz de amdoas las mas encemps.	And place two pillows below his lips, then put your index fingers of both hands on top of his chest.
E la femna sia sobre le sieu dos, las sieuas coyssas extendudas, e aprop exten las doas labias am forsa entro que aquel ciphac subtil sia romput e la oppilacio sia uberta.	The woman should be on her back, with her thighs extended, then spread the two lips forcefully until that subtle covering is broken and the obstruction is opened.
E aprop pren lana e enbeu le4 en oli e pausa aquela sobre·l loc, e jagua am home le dia per so que·l loc inscis no sia consolidat.	Then take some wool, soak it in oil, and place it on the wound; have a man hold it there for a day to prevent the incision from hardening.
Mays si le ciphac es gros e espes, lahoras cove que tu inscidas aquel am spatum lat o am fuelha de mirta.	But if the covering is thick and dense, then use a broad knife or myrtle leaf to incise it.
Mays si la oppilacio es per carnada, lahoras suspen aquela am unci, e inscideys aquela.	If the obstruction is due to flesh, then suspend it with thread, and cut into it.
E sian am tu las medicinas que fan cessar flux de sanc ses mordicacio, ayssi cum ahacatia, e sanc de drago, e enses, ajustat am album de huou.	And these are the medicines that stop bleeding without a bite: achillea, dragon's blood, and onions mixed with egg white.
E aprop aministra una canulha de plom ampla per so que la plagua no sia consolidada leugierament.	Then insert a wide lead tube to prevent the ulcer from hardening superficially.
E tengua aquela per alcus jorns e aministra calgua de li sec.	Keep it in place for several days, and administer a poultice of dry leaves.
E aprop sia curada am l’autra curacio de consolidacio entro que sia sanada.	And then it is cured with another treatment of consolidation until it is healed.
E alcunas vetz accideys en la mayre nativitat de autres carns, e lahoras cove que inscidas segon aquesta manieyra.	Sometimes accidents occur during childbirth with other flesh, in which case it is necessary to cut according to this method.
Mays si aysso es per apostema crancos, a l’apostema crancos le qual es en la mayre no sia fayta contrarietat am ferr en deguna manieyra.	But if this is due to an abscess in the brain, one should not make any contradiction with iron on the mother.
Capitol .lxxiii.	Chapter 73.
De la cura de emorroydas e de tayl e de botor roja que accideysso en le conh de las femnas.	On the treatment of hemorrhoids, tail bone issues, and red bumps that occur in women's genitals.
Emorroydas so apprecio dels orificis de motas venas entro que de aquelas corro mot sanc continuadament; e cum so antiquadas emorroydas e son fayts theyls.	Hemorrhoids are considered to be the dilation of small veins around the anus, from which a continuous flow of blood occurs; and when hemorrhoids become old and form lumps.
E ja yeu he dit en la divisio las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e diyre ayssi aquelas que recebo curacio e aquelas que no recebo curacio.	I have already discussed the different types of hemorrhoids and their symptoms, as well as those that can be treated and those that cannot.
Donc dic que emorroydas e theyls quan so en le preon de la mayre e no apparo al sentiment, lahoras en aquelas no sia fayta curacio am ferr.	Therefore, I say that hemorrhoids and lumps that are located deep inside the mother's rectum and are not felt should not be treated with iron.
Mays aquelas las quals so en le orrifici de la mayre sobre las quals catz sentiment, so aquelas que so curadas.	Mays aquellas las cuales son en el orificio de la matriz (útero) donde se percibe sensibilidad, esas son las que se curan.
E cove que tu metas la femna en mayso frega e aprop exten atheyl am les forfexs, o am drap aspre, e inscideys aquelas am las razitz.	And now you should place the woman in a warm bath and then extend her thighs with forceps or a rough cloth, and make incisions in them with a sharp instrument.
E aprop pulveriza sobre aquelas deves le fluxs del sanc de una de las polveras insciscivas ses mordicacio, ayssi cum acassia e semblant ad aquels.	Then sprinkle over these wounds the blood of one of the leeches with their bite marks; use this just as you would acacia and other similar substances.
E aprop enpellesca les sieus pes per una hora, e aprop pausa aquela en aygua freja.	And now immerse her feet for an hour, then place them in cold water.
E si persevera le fluxs del sanc, lahoras fay aquela sezer en decoccio de sumat e de scorsas de milgranas e de gualas e de semblantz.	And if the blood flow persists, then make her drink a decoction of wormwood and pomegranate rinds as well as other similar substances.
E aprop pren farina de ordi e comfiys aquela am miel e vi agre e fay emplastre am aquo sobre le dos de lu.	Then take oat flour, mix it with honey and sour wine to make a poultice, and apply this to the patient's back.
E si le sanc es abscindit, bo es; e sino, fay adherir am dos ventozas, e a las mamilhas ses escarificatio.	If blood comes out, good; if not, apply two cupping glasses and make incisions on the breasts.
E aprop pren lana e submergeys aquela am suc de coliandre o am suc de arnagloza o am suc de guarravier am vi pentit e fay adherir al loc; e aprop cura le loc am enguentz entro que sia sanat.	Then take wool and soak it in either coriander juice, or elderflower juice or even butcher's broom juice with vinegar, apply this to the area and keep the wound clean until it is healed.
Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.	Mays athyl rog le qual es de aspre reguardament, cove que tu inscidas aquo que a tu appar de aquel segon que he dit en theyl engualment.
E cura aquel entro que sia sanat.	And when that one has healed within.
Capitol .lxxiv.	Chapter 74. (Note: The number lxxiv is represented as 74 in Arabic numerals.)
De perforacio de eyssedura accident en la mayre.	Regarding the piercing or cutting of the uterus accidentally.
Motas specias de apostemas accideysso en la mayre, ayssi cum cranc e apostema lapident e ulceracios e adhubelat e erpetromens e fistulas emorroyas e raguarrias e thyl e autres apostemas.	Special notes on abscesses that occur in the uterus, as well as cancer, abscess of a stone (lithopedion), ulcers, adhesions, herpetic lesions, fistulae, haemorrhoids, ragworm infestations, cysts, and other abscesses.
E yeu ja he dit aquestas malautias e las specias de aquelas e les senhals de aquelas, e las curacios de lor en la divisio.	I have already described these diseases, their types, symptoms, and the treatments for them in this section.
E cove que yeu digua en aquest tractat de apostema caut le qual ve en la mayre quan es dels apostemas que collegeysso sania, e si vols saber en qual manieyra se fa la opperacio de lu am ferr.	Now I wish to speak in this treatise about an abscess that occurs on the uterus, one of the abscesses that can be cured; and if you wish to know how it is operated upon with an iron instrument.
Adonc cove que tu consideres si la dolor de la apostema en le sieu comensament es aguda am percussio e flecma e febre, e vezes aquel enrogezir e si catz sobre aquel le sentiment, lahoras no·t coytes am perforacio de lu, e cura aquel am aquo que ajuda sobre la maturacio entro que cesse la acuitat dels accidentz.	Therefore consider that if the pain of the abscess in its early stage is sharp with percussion, phlegm, and fever, and sometimes it reddens and becomes hard to the touch, then do not proceed with piercing it, but rather treat it with what helps the maturation from within so that the severity of the symptoms ceases.
E lahoras cove que tu fassas cezer la femna sobre una cezelha que aia doas cezelhas; e recline sobre le sieu dos e ajusta les sieus pes a la partida pus dejos del ventre, e las sieus coyssas sian expandudas, e pausa les sieus brasses dejos les sieus denols, e lia quascus am liament ad aquo convenient.	And then it is necessary for you to make the woman lie down on a bed that has two pillows; and lean her back against the edge of the bed and adjust her feet towards the lower part below the abdomen, and let her thighs be spread apart, and place her arms underneath her buttocks, and tie each [part] with suitable binding.
E aprop la matrona segua del latz dreyt e aministre le instrument am le qual es ubert le orrifici de la mayre, la forma del qual vindra en aquelas causas que·s faran aprop.	Then the midwife should approach from the right side and use an instrument to open up the mother's birth canal in a manner that will be determined by the circumstances.
E cove quan vols ministrar aquest instrument que tu fiques am lo ray le preon de la mayre de la femna, e aquo que del instrument es intrat en la mayre no sia mays que·l preon de la mayre e leda le malaute.	And take care when handling this instrument that you do not apply too much pressure on the mother's abdomen; and ensure that only a small portion of the instrument enters the mother, so as to avoid injuring her or causing harm to the patient.
Mays si l’estrument es major que·l preon de la mayre, lahoras cove que tu pauses pulvils sobre la textura del preon de la mayre per sso que sia prohibit l’intrament de tot instrument en le preon de la mayre.	If the instrument is larger than the mother's opening, then it is important to place powders on the surface of her abdomen in order to prevent any foreign objects from entering into the birth canal.
E cove que tu pauses le vertitge que corr en le strument del latz pus desus e que le ministre tengua le strument e revolva le vertitge entro que sia ubert le orrifici de la mayre.	Be sure to grasp the handle which extends beyond the side of the instrument, and ensure that the person administering has a firm grip on the instrument before rotating it as you open up the mother's birth canal.
E cum appar la excitura, e es tocada am la ma e es leon e molh, lahoras cove que tu secces aquela deves le cap de lu am spatum lat.	And when you see that the wound is open, and it feels warm and moist to the touch, then you must dry it by cutting off its head with a broad scalpel.
E cum la sania es evacuada, lahoras cove que tu pauses en la plagua una meca submersa en oli rozat o oli vert en le qual sia alcuna stiptisitat; e pausa la calca7 en la seccio en le preon de la mayre.	And when the wound is evacuated, you should place on it a sponge soaked in rose oil or green oil, which has some styptic quality; and put the plaster on the wound inside the membrane.
E pause deforo la mayre e sobre le pentenilh lana munda submersa en aygua en la qual sian bulidas malvas.	Place outside the membrane and on top of the periosteum a clean cloth soaked in water infused with steeped mallows.
E aprop sia curada aprop dos dias am enguent le qual conveneys ad aquo entro que sia sanat.	And it shall be healed within two days by an ointment you must apply, which is suitable for this wound as it heals.
E alcunas veguadas es lavada la mayre e la plagua enayssi que es cristerisat am aygua e mel, e aprop am aygua en la qual es bulhida razit de liri o de aristologia longua, e aprop retorna al enguent.	In some cases, the membrane and the wound are washed with a solution of water and honey, then they are crystallized with water in which rhizomes of lily or long aristo have been boiled; finally, return to applying ointment.
E si la plagua es dedintz en la mayre ameguada, lahoras cove que tu sias prohibit de la curacio de lu am ferr, habantz cura aquel am aquo que havem dit en la divisio.	And if the wound is inside a softened membrane, then you must be aware that it cannot be cured with iron instruments; rather treat it as we have described in this section.
